name: Toddlebot
0:
”Alexa, open toddle bot”
”my favorite day is Saturday”
”my favorite meal is dessert”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: toddle bot
des:
Toddlebot is a delightful robot who likes to talk to little kids about food, numbers, shapes and more. Suitable for ages 2 - 4 years.

Toddlebot will lead the conversation by telling you her favorite color, shape etc. and you can tell Toddlebot what your favorite is. If you match with Toddlebot then she will be happy, if she recognizes what you said then she will acknowledge it.

The skill is for young kids who are familiarizing themselves with common words and subjects.

Privacy Information
No personal information is collected by this skill. The skill only asks for favorite food, meals, shapes, colors, days and numbers. This information is only used within the skill session. The information is not stored or reused anywhere except within the application itself.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
